rows: Analyzes bulk email bounces by examining specific bounce responses with reasons and recommendations. Enables marketers to gain detailed insights into why an email failed to deliver and receive actionable recommendations to prevent similar issues in the future. This reduces email bounces in future sending, i.e., improves bounce rate. Such an approach to bounce analysis minimizes manual effort and reduces the time required to diagnose and resolve bounce-related issues.

Analyzes bulk email subject lines for potential spam words and flags them, then generates alternative suggestions that are more attractive and less likely to be marked as spam. Enables marketers to check for any words or phrases that can be caught by spam filters quickly before sending. Certain words or phrases can trigger spam filters, so tools help avoid them to ensure better email deliverability. Subject lines can make or break whether an email gets opened, and tools can suggest more engaging options to boost open rates. Helps maintain a consistent tone and brand voice across all subject lines, even in different campaigns. Minimizes mistakes like typos or inconsistencies in subject lines, ensuring quality and accuracy. Saves time, avoiding the need to come up with new ideas manually.

Provides a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the account's lead conversion score and their impact. The account's lead conversion score provides valuable insights into how engaged and ready an account's contacts are for sales efforts. Helps with ABM, campaign segmentation, and identifying cross-sell/upsell opportunities.

Provides a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the contact's lead conversion score and their impact. Helps marketers understand which contacts are most likely to convert. Supports campaign targeting, budget optimization, and efficient sales handoffs.

Detects whether the user intends to create a new marketing email or edit an existing one, and adapts behavior accordingly. Serves as the foundational step in conversational email workflows by intelligently detecting user intent and collecting relevant parameters for new email creation or selective updates for email editing.

Assembles all components into a complete, publishable marketing email with no-code layout, subject line, and internal name. Finalizes email creation by building no-code layout elements ready for user customization, generating compelling subject lines, creating searchable internal names, and opening the email designer for immediate use. Email creation typically requires core user input including goal, target audience, and key content details.

Enables precision editing of existing marketing email templates through conversational instructions. Allows targeted template modifications including text, styles, and links while maintaining structural consistency.

Transforms high-level email descriptions into fully compliant no-code layouts with rows, columns, and modules. Converts simplified email descriptions into structured layouts with strict schema validation and customizable styling.

Generates high-performing subject lines based on approved email content for optimal engagement. Analyzes email body content to create concise, relevant subject lines that align with purpose, audience, and brand voice while optimizing for open rates.

Generates clear, descriptive, and searchable internal names for bulk emails. Creates clear, searchable internal names based on email content and subject line to help marketers organize, locate, and report on email campaigns efficiently.
